name: Adventures of Malcolm
description:
This is my first game that I have ever made so don't expect much, I am just looking for motivation to pursue the game industry.

This is a eerie platform game that involves a ghost-looking sprite completing the levels.

I understand that this game is really worth $0, but the reason why I posted it at $1 is because I need the money to get better software to make more comprehensive games. Take it like a donation.
